segment.source: Set up MDT for BitLocker
segment.target: Set up MDT for BitLocker

segment.source: This topic will show you how to configure your environment for BitLocker, the disk volume encryption built into Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Pro, using MDT.
segment.target: This topic will show you how to configure your environment for BitLocker, the disk volume encryption built into Windows 10 Enterprise and Windows 10 Pro, using MDT.

segment.source: BitLocker in Windows 10 has two requirements in regard to an operating system deployment:
segment.target: BitLocker in Windows 10 has two requirements in regard to an operating system deployment:

segment.source: A protector, which can either be stored in the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) chip, or stored as a password.
segment.target: A protector, which can either be stored in the Trusted Platform Module (TPM) chip, or stored as a password.

segment.source: Technically, you also can use a USB stick to store the protector, but it's not a practical approach as the USB stick can be lost or stolen.
segment.target: Technically, you also can use a USB stick to store the protector, but it's not a practical approach as the USB stick can be lost or stolen.

segment.source: We, therefore, recommend that you instead use a TPM chip and/or a password.
segment.target: We, therefore, recommend that you instead use a TPM chip and/or a password.

segment.source: Multiple partitions on the hard drive.
segment.target: Multiple partitions on the hard drive.
